p: Quarantine has negative and potentially prolonged effects on the psychological health of individuals, including post-traumatic stress symptoms, confusion, and anger ( Brooks et al., 2020). In children and adolescents, periods without school are associated with decreased physical activity, more screen time, irregular sleep patterns, and less appropriate diets ( Wang et al., 2020). There are reciprocal interactions between brain maturation and social environment, and isolation may have an influence on psychiatric disorder onsets during adolescence ( Lamblin et al., 2017).
